topline_md: Recent updates in New York City include a woman charged with drugging men with fentanyl, leading to three deaths, and an off-duty NYPD officer narrowly escaping death after being pushed onto subway tracks. Additionally, a man died after being set on fire in Brooklyn, highlighting ongoing public safety concerns.
